recipesJson.name: Pineapple coconut for pod
recipesJson.author: TheJuiceJackBuilt
recipesJson.description: My 1st recipe that i thought was good enough for public consumption. Made this recipe a few hours ago, for the misses to have in her pod. Nothing fancy, just a pineapple coconut mix. Its good off the shake, i'll update any changes if it needs. Hope yall enjoy :)
